The correct chronological order of events is:

  1. On the right side, “RONALDO” 7 is visible among celebrating players; the speaker recalls the score moving from 2-1 to 3-1 and mentions Maguire and Casemiro substitutions, surprised Anthony was subbed.
  2. Crowd shot with a red-shirt number 10 among fans; the speaker laughs, admitting he’s getting overhyped after beating Arsenal.
  3. Split-screen shows Antony (21) celebrating with a teammate wearing 39; the speaker praises Eriksen’s vision and defends McTominay’s selection.
  4. A bald manager in a dark suit raises his fist; the speaker says Erik ten Hag deserves serious credit and Arsenal will feel aggrieved.
  5. Antony (21) celebrates again; the speaker lauds transfers like Martinez and cautions against dismissing teams except Leicester.

Therefore, the correct answer is option C: 1 -> 3 -> 4 -> 2 -> 5.

The correct chronological order is: 
2 - Opening shot of the host in a sports-decor room; he shouts “Come! Come on!” and celebrates a 3-1 win.
3 - Fans go wild as a red-shirt with number 10 and “ANTony” runs with arms raised; the speaker exclaims Marcus Rashford had two goals and an assist.
4 - Number 10 celebrates with fans, then Antony (21) appears with a child nearby; the speaker talks about a front three of Sancho, Rashford, Anthony and Martial returning.
5 - Split-screen shows three United players celebrating with number 39 visible; the speaker compares performances vs Southampton and Leicester, “boom boom boom.”
6 - A suited manager pumps his fist; the speaker says Ronaldo can sense the team’s energy and stresses 100% effort.
7 - The video ends on a red “UNITED PEOPLES TV” screen with a Subscribe button as upbeat hip-hop music plays after “Welcome to Manchester United, lad.”

Therefore, the correct answer is option C: 2 -> 5 -> 3 -> 4 -> 6 -> 1.
